DataShape.description: A more in-depth Thing property definition for use in the AddPropertyDefinitions service
DataShape.name: PropertyDefinitionWithDetails

FieldDefinition.description: Base data type of the property
FieldDefinition.name: baseType

FieldDefinition.description: The default value for the property
FieldDefinition.name: defaultValue

FieldDefinition.description: Flag indicating whether or not this property has a persistent value
FieldDefinition.name: isLogged

FieldDefinition.description: Flag indicating whether or not this property has a persistent value
FieldDefinition.name: isPersistent

FieldDefinition.description: Flag indicating whether or not this property is read only
FieldDefinition.name: isReadOnly

FieldDefinition.description: Flag indicating whether or not this property is bound to a remote property
FieldDefinition.name: isRemote

FieldDefinition.description: For remote properties only: Push threshold
FieldDefinition.name: pushThreshold

FieldDefinition.description: For remote properties only: Push type
FieldDefinition.name: pushType

FieldDefinition.description: For remote properties only: Remote binding aspects
FieldDefinition.name: remoteBindingAspects

FieldDefinition.description: For remote properties only: The name of the remote property
FieldDefinition.name: remotePropertyName

FieldDefinition.description: For remote properties only: Connection timeout
FieldDefinition.name: timeout
